name: Art Of Gravity
description: Art Of Gravity is a voxel/physics based puzzle game, revolving around the theme of destroying abstract figures, which results in mesmerizing displays of dance of gravity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Game does a lot of physics calculations, quality CPU needed.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GF 1070 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Game does a lot of physics calculations, quality CPU needed.
